Alerts by Severity"},"viz_Evh8ZT4T":{"type":"viz.geojson.world","options":{"name":"WORLD","source":"geo://default/world","projection":"mercator","backgroundColor":"transparent","sourceBounds":{"lat":{"min":-60,"max":85},"long":{"min":-180,"max":180}},"logicalBounds":{"x":{"min":0,"max":800},"y":{"min":0,"max":600}},"fillColor":"#EAEFF2","strokeColor":"#689C8D","strokeHighlightColor":"#000000","selector":".feature"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_xCxJvZzV"}},"viz_ZvdHPALX":{"type":"viz.text","options":{"content":"Intrusion Attacks from External Sources","fontSize":14,"fontWeight":"bold"}},"viz_aQ00QaGT":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"fill":"#212527","fillOpacity":0.5,"stroke":"#708794","rx":4,"strokeOpacity":0.99}},"viz_A7EOvKzn":{"type":"viz.bar","options":{"legend.labelStyle.overflowMode":"ellipsisStart","backgroundColor":"transparent","legend.placement":"none"},"dataSources":{"primary":"ds_HlCVkmVd"},"title":"Scanning Activity (Many Attacks from Same Source)"},"viz_2Z7QS6v5":{"type":"viz.rectangle","options":{"stroke":"#708794","fillOpacity":0.2,"fill":"#ffffff","rx":10}},"viz_SHU9aIAW":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_pbEI6hW7"},"title":"Scanning Activity (Many Attacks from Same Source) by Source Location"},"viz_IbjZtjww":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_CnGGNDrm"},"title":"Intrusion Signatures"}},"dataSources":{"ds_t6XLycVu":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where IDS_Attacks.severity=critical"},"name":"Critical Security Alerts"},"ds_P896ttWA":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where IDS_Attacks.severity=high"},"name":"High severity alerts"},"ds_wuMeJdiS":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where IDS_Attacks.severity=medium"},"name":"Medium Severity Alerts"},"ds_SwHTIoHy":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where IDS_Attacks.severity=low"},"name":"Low Severity Alerts"},"ds_saN9VA5V":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where IDS_Attacks.severity=info*"},"name":"Informational Alerts"},"ds_b1W0PxA5":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where (IDS_Attacks.action=allowed OR IDS_Attacks.action=unknown) "},"name":"Allowed intrusion attempts"},"ds_3Tn3JS9S":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks where (IDS_Attacks.action=block* OR IDS_Attacks.action=drop*)"},"name":"Blocked Intrusion Attempts"},"ds_gFg23ZwH":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by _time, IDS_Attacks.signature span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m count by IDS_Attacks.signature limit=20"},"name":"Intrusion Alerts by Signature"},"ds_LD1CQAv6":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats prestats=true summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by _time, IDS_Attacks.severity span=10m 
| timechart minspan=10m count by IDS_Attacks.severity"},"name":"Intrusion Alerts by Severity"},"ds_xCxJvZzV":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by IDS_Attacks.src, IDS_Attacks.signature 
| rename "IDS_Attacks.*" as "*" 
| iplocation src 
| stats count by Country
| geom geo_countries allFeatures=True featureIdField=Country"},"name":"Intrusion Attacks from External Sources"},"ds_HlCVkmVd":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(IDS_Attacks.signature) as attack_count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by IDS_Attacks.src 
| rename "IDS_Attacks.src" as src, "IDS_Attacks.*" as "*" 
| sort 5 - attack_count"},"name":"Scanning Activity (Many Attacks from Same Source)"},"ds_pbEI6hW7":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true dc(IDS_Attacks.signature) as attack_count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by IDS_Attacks.src 
| where attack_count>1 
| rename "IDS_Attacks.*" as "*" 
| iplocation src 
| eval Country=ifnull(Country,"unknown",Country), City=if(City="","unknown",ifnull(City,"unknown",City))
| sort 5 - attack_count 
| table Country, City, src, attack_count"},"name":"Scanning Activity (Many Attacks from Same Source) by Source Location"},"ds_CnGGNDrm":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"queryParameters":{"earliest":"-24h@h","latest":"now"},"query":"| tstats summariesonly=true allow_old_summaries=true count from datamodel=Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks by IDS_Attacks.signature, IDS_Attacks.severity | rename "IDS_Attacks.*" as "*" | sort severity"},"name":"Intrusion Signatures"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"width":1400,"backgroundImage":{"sizeType":"cover","x":0,"y":0,"src":"splunk-enterprise-kvstore://623c187e971a2b18a97a72e9"},"height":1500,"showTitleAndDescription":false},"structure":[{"item":"viz_8xRM6zUR","type":"line","position":{"from":{"x":45,"y":117},"to":{"x":328,"y":116}}},{"item":"viz_mrsio08F","type":"line","position":{"from":{"x":45,"y":226},"to":{"x":329,"y":226}}},{"item":"viz_iI5qqkQq","type":"line","position":{"from":{"x":43,"y":336},"to":{"x":328,"y":335}}},{"item":"viz_8v2Z1Pan","type":"line","position":{"from":{"x":41,"y":445},"to":{"x":326,"y":444}}},{"item":"viz_F9oM3VxN","type":"line","position":{"from":{"x":44,"y":556},"to":{"x":329,"y":555}}},{"item":"viz_SBHbTyfh","type":"line","position":{"from":{"x":523,"y":208},"to":{"x":808,"y":207}}},{"item":"viz_gnfslQay","type":"line","position":{"from":{"x":936,"y":207},"to":{"x":1221,"y":206}}},{"item":"viz_2Z7QS6v5","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":1160,"w":1370,"h":270}},{"item":"viz_xspjCeCP","type":"block","position":{"x":370,"y":280,"w":1020,"h":370}},{"item":"viz_UR6WfPDH","type":"block","position":{"x":910,"y":290,"w":470,"h":350}},{"item":"viz_MLe7N7WB","type":"block","position":{"x":670,"y":1170,"w":710,"h":250}},{"item":"viz_I6SRm1ua","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":670,"w":1370,"h":480}},{"item":"viz_Ut01Rvgv","type":"block","position":{"x":30,"y":680,"w":625,"h":460}},{"item":"viz_glwKX20G","type":"block","position":{"x":450,"y":80,"w":840,"h":150}},{"item":"viz_tk5GsF2a","type":"block","position":{"x":20,"y":80,"w":330,"h":570}},{"item":"viz_ypI6lENf","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":230,"w":290,"h":80}},{"item":"viz_7kg4b4TU","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":120,"w":290,"h":80}},{"item":"viz_RBZIc8tN","type":"block","position":{"x":2130,"y":450,"w":980,"h":670}},{"item":"viz_lXOoeKrp","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":80,"w":280,"h":40}},{"item":"viz_VZxTynue","type":"block","position":{"x":40,"y":450,"w":290,"h":
